segments.text: Hi , Jim ! When did you get back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yesterday . I was really sorry to see it end . The skiing was terrific !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m really jealous ! I won ’ t be able to get any time off for at least another three or four months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry to hear that ! But I would definitely recommend this place !
segments.speaker: S2
